game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient temple and retrieve the Golden Idol
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost temple deep in the jungle, where an ancient civilization once worshipped their gods. The temple is said to contain a Golden Idol with immense power and value.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and increased reputation among the village elders
game.quest-giver: Elder Kanaq, Village Elder of Oakwood

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location from the village locals
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather any information you can find about the lost temple. Be careful, some may be unwilling to share their knowledge.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the temple entrance
task.description: Use your survival skills and navigate through the dense jungle. Be prepared for any dangers that may lurk within.

task.objective: Retrieve the Golden Idol from the temple's inner sanctum
task.description: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve the Golden Idol. Be prepared for traps and puzzles that guard the treasure.
task.location: The Lost Temple, deep in the jungle
